data.text:
His expertise in previous works landed him the role of Josh in the family comedy “Television Raising a Father ” which heralded his career breakthrough in the Swiss spotlight. The series starred other stars such as Bob Saget and Kat Dennings and aired from 2000-2001. Ben disappeared from Hollywood after his appearance in the American sitcom titled Love Inc Formerly which was released in 2005.

His capital

One remarkable thing about Ben Indra is that his career was short but very impactful. He made good money in Hollywood before bowing out. He received a $900,000 divorce settlement from his ex-wife, which increased his monetary value and value. At the moment his net worth is not known but it sure is hefty.

Ben Indra’s ex-wife – Anna Faris

Ben Indra stayed with Anna Faris as a friend longer than he lived with her as a husband. Anna is a famous actress, comedian, author and producer. She was born on November 29, 1976 in Baltimore and is famous for her roles in films like Scary Movie , Lost in Transition , Alvin and Chipmunks and many more films.

The duo met on the set of Lovers Lane in 1999 and dated a few years before a close friends and family wedding on June 3, 2004.

They lived happily as husband and wife for 3 years before marital problems erupted, leading to their divorce. Although they decided to divorce in April 2007, the divorce was finalized in February 2008 with a $900,000 divorce settlement paid to Ben Indra.

Ben hasn’t been heard from much since the incident, but the ex-wife quickly found another boyfriend and husband in Chris Pratt, a well-known actor who starred opposite Anna Faris in the film Take Me Home Tonight.

They married in July 2009 in Bali,Indonesia but their marriage ended in 2017 with a divorce that was finalized in 2017 but not without producing a son named Jack Pratt who was born in August 2012.

Other facts

1. Ben Indra’s height is given as 1.70 m (5 ft 5 in) tall while his frame is supported by a weight of 78 kg (171.9 lbs).

2. It was alleged that he could not cope with his ex-wife’s tremendous success in her career and the misfortune caused serious tensions in their marriage, which drove his then-wife to divorce.

3. Their property and house were sold and the proceeds split between them, fortunately there were no children from the marriage.

4. Former talent actor Ben Indra suddenly went off the radar after his divorce. No one can really say what has become of him now.
